note: Kill Endermen in The End using full Ender Armor and a Void Sword or Dreadlord Sword.
Throw Goblin Eggs that you get from killing Goblins or opening chests in the Crystal Hollows
in the Dwarven Mines and kill what spawns from it.
You should use SkyHanni's Trapper features to make this easier.
Use /warp trapper to get back to Trevor whenever you want
Do your daily experiments in the Experimentation Table, always do the highest tier you can.
Kill Endermen in The End using full Ender Armor and a Void Sword or Dreadlord Sword.
Talk to Jamie (-36 68 -39) in The Hub and claim the Rogue Sword from him.
Right Click it to gain temporarily +100 Speed.
Wear armor enchanted with Growth 5 (Enchanting Level 5).
Applying Growth 5 costs 50 Levels each.
Kill farm animals in the Barn with a Cleaver with Cleave 5 and Sharpness 5
or spiders in Arachne's Burrow (-309 92 -209) in the Spider's Den with a Dreadlord Sword.
You can also kill Endermen in The End to get progress towards the Lucky Looter
and Enderman Slayer Community Goal.
Go to The End to mine Ender Nodes and kill Nest Mites for Enchanted End Stone.
You need to be Combat Level 12 to go there.
Kill Goblins in the Goblin Burrows (-100 163 150) while an event is going on.
You need Mining Level 12 to visit the required island.
Start an Entrance floor and play Mage/Tank/Berserker to use
the classes abilities to kill a Lost Adventurer. You only need to get the last hit
on it to count, so you can get help from your team.
You need Combat Level 15 to join a Dungeon.
Optimal for this would be using a Golden Axe with Efficiency 5 and
having the Haste 3 potion effect to chop down Dark Oak. Reforge your Axe to Double-Bit or Lush
for bonus foraging fortune. Unlock Dark Oak Minions and place them on your island.
Remember to level them up using the material they produce and give them at least a medium storage
and the best fuel you can afford if you can collect them in time.
You can also manually forage in the Dark Thicket area (-353 103 -23) in The Park (/warp park).
You can go for the following sets:
Leather, Iron, Gold, Diamond, (those need 24 of the respective material to be made)
Chainmail (buy it from the Iron Forger in The Gold Mine at -2 75 -308 for 275 coins),
Ender (requires all 4 equipments aswell), Leaflet (Oak Wood 3 and 24 Oak Leaves to craft),
Farm Suit (Wheat 3 and 24 Hay Bales to craft), Mushroom (Mushroom 3 and 24 Red Mushrooms to craft),
Cactus (Cactus 2 and 24 Cactus to craft), Pumpkin (Pumpkin 2 and 24 Pumpkins to craft),
Buy those following sets from Rosetta in The Hub (-12 68 -141)
Squire (Combat 5 and 24k coins), Rosettaâ€™s (4530 coins),
Celeste (Combat 5 and 24k coins), Starlight (Combat 8 and 180k coins).
Get yourself a splash, equip a Bingo Pet
and get the cake buff by eating the cakes on owocato's, xMeru's or prtl's island.
If this doesn't finish it, get a Void Sword (200k) in the End
and hold it while some Ender Armor and/or Equipment.
Do your daily commissions to unlock the Crystal Hollows at Heart of the Mountain III
(this will need 3 days worth of daily commissions (4 each)).
Find Bal by asking in chat or using Wishing Compasses.
You will most likely get this passively.
Use /be ingame to view your progress.
You can visit all Islands by using the warp command.
The Hub (/hub), Spider's Den (/warp spider), The End (/warp end),
Gold Mine (/warp gold), Deep Caverns (/warp deep),
Farming Isles (/warp barn & /warp desert)
Remember that some of them require certain skill levels to enter.
It follows a list of more than 22 accessories you can go for:
Buyable from the Adventurer in the Hub (-41 70 -64):
Zombie/Skeleton Talisman: 500 coins each
Village/Mine Affinity Talisman: 2.5k coins each
Intimidation/Scavenger Talisman: 10k coins each
Collection Talismans:
Night Vision Charm (Mushroom 7), Farming Talisman (Wheat 4),
Vaccine Talisman (Potato 3), Gravity Talisman (Obsidian 3)
Talisman of Coins (Emerald 2), Magnetic Talisman (Emerald 3)
Emerald Ring (Emerald 5), Wood Affinity Talisman (Oak Wood 8)
Speed Talisman (Sugar Cane 2), Potion Affinity Talisman (Nether Wart 3)
Other:
Archaeologists Compass, Shiny Yellow Rock, Campfire Initiate Badge,
King Talisman, Cat Talisman, Spider Talisman, Frozen Chicken,
Red Claw Talisman (Wolf Slayer Level 1), Candy Talisman,
New Year Cake Bag (250k), Glacial Talisman (Frozen Treasure).
Don't forget to take the 4 Bonus accessory bag slots from
the Redstone Miner (24 104 16), he asks for 1920 Redstone in total.
Optimal for this would be using a Golden Axe with Efficiency 5 and
having the Haste 3 potion effect to chop down Dark Oak. Reforge your Axe to Lumberjack's
or buy a Moil Log (50k) from the Smithmonger in the Hub (-32 69 -135)
and apply it to your axe for more Foraging Wisdom.
You will most likely get this while going for Dark Oak Wood Collector.
Mine emeralds in the Dwarven Mines minecarts above the Bank.
It requires 32 Enchanted Emeralds and Emerald Collection 5 to craft this.
Open chests in the Crystal Hollows (Heart of the Mountain III), do commissions in
The Dwarven Mines, claim your daily powder from the Puzzler (181 196 135) and
from giving Fetchur (84 224 -118) the items he asks for. Fetchurs items are all listed in the Wiki.
Try to do those while a '2x Powder' event is active.
You can find Relic Coordinates in Skytils or the Wiki.
You will need Ender Pearls to reach some of them.
Get Enchanting Level 10 and play the first tier in the Experimentation Table.
Grind Ender Nodes in The End until you get one.
It has a 1.31% chance to drop from the Obsidian Nodes.
You need Combat Level 12 to get there.
Farm carrots in The Garden using an Advanced Gardening Hoe (25 Copper).
The Garden requires SkyBlock Level 5 to be entered and you need Garden Level 2
to plant carrots. A full plot of carrots requires 7896 carrots. You can farm those
in The Barn (/warp barn) or in the cave below the Mountain in The Hub.
